sources.title: Get that Girl
sources.description: In this rough-hewn film, Richard Talmadge helps a young woman (Shirley Grey) whom villains are trying to kidnap.

sources.title: Get That Girl (1932) RICHARD TALMADGEüçï SHIRLEY GREY
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents Classic Movie Monday
Starring: Richard Talmadge, Shirley Grey, Fred Malatesta
The Henchman: Victor Metzetti, Arthur Metzetti, Otto Metzetti
Director: George Crone

In this pre-Code Thriller by Mercury Pictures, Richard Talmadge, "The Dare Devil of the Screen," must thwart a crazed doctor‚Äôs sinister plot to transform young women into lifeless mannequins! 

TRIVIA: Richard Talmadge, born Sylvester Ricardo Metzetti, was a member of the Flying Metzettis, a family of acrobats renowned as the first trapeze act to perform the quadruple back somersault!

metadata.Plot: A young girl who is about to receive a large inheritance is abducted to an isolated sanitarium where a crazed doctor is performing strange experiments.
metadata.Actors: Richard Talmadge, Shirley Grey, Fred Malatesta
